name: Marble Heroes
description: Marble Heroes was established to provide a simplified environment to avoid the common troubles and tricks in traditional games, and provide an accessible platform for players to get the rewards they deserve. After witnessing that the real world is dominated by the imbalance of wealth, we are determined to contribute to the construction of the future world, democratize everyone's access to wealth, and give communities around the world the opportunity to create their own wealth creation moments that will change their lives, all in order to build their comfortable homes.
